subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : All the following compounds react with p-toluenesulfonyl Statement (II) : Their products in the above reaction are soluble is aqueous given below

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
